Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39379 affecting package rubygem-fluentd for versions less than 1.14.6-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-39379 affecting package rubygem-fluentd for versions less than 1.14.6-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-fluentd is earlier than 1.14.6-2, affected by CVE-2022-39379
